description.value: Before an enemy targets you with an attack, you can use this reaction and spend 1 focus to add a disadvantage to their attack test. You can’t use this reaction on area attacks or on those that target multiple characters, though you might be able to @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.actions.Item.9cVxEnB5ayw52fTA]{Avoid Danger} and move out of the way.
